snippet: The former brother-in-law of the actress and singer Jennifer Hudson was convicted on Friday of murdering her mother, brother and young nephew.
abstract: William Balfour, former brother-in-law of singer and actress Jennifer Hudson, is convicted of murdering Hudson's mother, brother and young nephew in Chicago.
lead_paragraph: The former brother-in-law of the actress and singer Jennifer Hudson was convicted on Friday of murdering her mother, brother and young nephew.

headline.seo: William Balfour Guilty in Killing of Hudson’s Family
headline.main: Guilty Verdict in Murder Case That Involved Singer’s Family
headline.print_headline: Guilty Verdict In Murder Case That Involved Singer’s Family
